Entries.Mon: And another productive work week begins. I hope Shaylin performs better this week than last.$0#$e#I swear that girl gets lazier every day. Maybe I'll dock his pay.$3

Entries.6665290/J/w sunny/t 1000 1800/f MorrisTo: springtown/-500 -500/farmer 54 36 0 Morris 54 25 0 Olivia 30 22 2 Caroline 29 23 1 Jodi 31 23 3 Penny 18 16 0 Jas 24 12 0 Vincent 18 14 2 Demetrius 27 29 0 Gus 37 14 0 Shane_JojaMart -200 -200 2 Shane -201 -201 2/pause 850/showFrame Morris 39/viewport 54 34 true/skippable/viewport move 0 -2 4500/move farmer 0 -7 0 true/pause 5150/showFrame Morris 38/pause 300/emote Morris 16/pause 150/showFrame Morris 39/pause 800/showFrame Morris 8/playSound bob/pause 900/showFrame Morris 0/pause 500/speak Morris "Hello, @.$1#$b#A shipment of Joja materials was scheduled today. We're moving crates and boxes into the warehouse.$0"/pause 600/warp Shane_JojaMart 53 20/playSound doorClose/pause 450/faceDirection Morris 1 true/pause 250/faceDirection Morris 0/move farmer -1 0 0/move farmer 0 -2 0 true/pause 800/move Shane_JojaMart 0 1 2 true/pause 700/speak Shane "I moved all the crates off the truck, Morris.$0"/pause 500/speak Morris "Delightful! Thank you, Shaylin.$1#$b#You may take the rest of the day off.$4"/pause 300/emote Shane_JojaMart 16 true/pause 300/speak Shane "You serious!?$6#$b#Thanks!$1"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp Shane_JojaMart -300 -300/viewport 54 25 true/pause 2000/question fork0 "#That was nice of you.#Why did you let her off early?"/pause 400/fork 6665290_ThatWasNice/move Morris 0 0 2/pause 400/speak Morris "Because I wanted to speak to you privately in the Joja warehouse.$0#$b#Come, there's much to discuss.$1"/switchEvent 6665290_JojaWarehouse
Entries.6665290_ThatWasNice: faceDirection Morris 1 true/pause 250/faceDirection Morris 2 true/pause 400/speak Morris "Shaylin's become my most trusted employee. She has grown within the Joja family.$1"/pause 900/showFrame Morris 34/pause 1200/showFrame Morris 0/pause 800/speak Morris "Join me inside the warehouse, @. I wish to discuss something with you.$0"/switchEvent 6665290_JojaWarehouse

Entries.Forest.57: Shaylin's chickens produce high quality eggs that get turned into mayonnaise.
Entries.Forest.60: Does Marnie cut wood? Or does Shaylin?

Entries.JojaMart: %Shaylin smiles at me as she works.

Entries.3219973/f Martin 2000/t 1800 2200/z wint: spring_night_ambient/-500 -500/Martin 15 11 0 Claire 17 11 0/changeLocation Custom_BusStop_NoBus/positionOffset Martin -15 -4/viewport 17 12 clamp true/skippable/pause 3000/shake Martin 500/pause 1500/faceDirection Martin 1 true/pause 500/speak Martin "It was busy today, huh? Haven't seen it like that in a while.$0"/pause 500/faceDirection Claire 3 true/pause 500/speak Claire "It was, yes... Honestly, I'm exhausted. I feel like I could fall asleep on the ride home.$1"/pause 300/speak Martin ".. Uh huh.$6"/pause 1500/faceDirection Claire 0 true/pause 1000/faceDirection Martin 0 true/pause 2500/shake Martin 500/pause 1250/faceDirection Martin 1 true/pause 500/speak Martin "Claire...$2"/pause 650/faceDirection Claire 3 true/pause 500/speak Claire "Yes?$1"/pause 400/speak Martin "...Nothing, I thought I saw something over there, but I think it was a squirrel.$4"/pause 500/speak Claire "Oh, all right.$0"/pause 1000/faceDirection Claire 0 true/pause 1200/faceDirection Martin 0 true/pause 2500/shake Martin 750/pause 1250/speak Martin "...Claire.$2"/pause 500/faceDirection Claire 3 true/pause 600/speak Claire "... Yes?$0"/pause 800/shake Martin 400/pause 700/speak Martin "...$2#$b#There's something I want to talk to you about.$2"/pause 500/speak Claire "Oh? Is something wrong?$2"/pause 500/faceDirection Martin 1 true/pause 500/speak Martin "No, nothing's wrong, I...$4"/pause 1000/shake Martin 500/pause 1000/speak Martin "You've been good to me since I started at Joja, Really really good.$6"/pause 500/speak Claire "Oh, it's nothing. I'm just glad I was finally able to make a friend there.$1#$b#It's not like Shaylin or Morris were likely to open up.$5"/pause 400/speak Martin "Friends... right.$6"/pause 1000/shake Martin 300/pause 700/stopMusic/speak Martin "Claire.. The thing is, um. I've never had to say this to anyone before. But.. I kind of like you as more than a friend.$6#$b#...Like.. a lot more, probably.$6"/pause 1650/speak Martin ".. I thought about it a lot. And I know I'm younger than you, but.. But we make each other happy, don't we?$6#$b#Do you think.. is there any way that maybe you'd like to be with me? Even a little? If not now, then someday?$6"/pause 1000/emote Claire 40/pause 1000/speak Martin "... Say something, Claire. Please?$2"/pause 1000/speak Claire "...$1#$b#Oh, Martin... I'm glad you said something.$1"/speak Martin "!!! Does that mean...$0"/pause 500/speak Claire "No, no. Martin, listen to me. You've got a whole life ahead of you. Especially now that you're seeing more of the world...$2#$b#I'm your friend, and I'll always be your friend. But it wouldn't be fair for me to promise more.$2#$b#You have so much ahead of you and so much to learn, and over the next few years you're going to change so much...$1#$b#When it comes down to it... we're just too different to be anything but friends.$2"/pause 800/playMusic spring_night_ambient/pause 500/faceDirection Martin 2 true/pause 400/showFrame Martin 16 true/pause 1750/speed Claire 1/move Claire -1 0 3/pause 800/speak Claire "Martin.. It doesn't mean I don't care about you. I really do. I love spending time together, the little jokes we make between shifts, riding the bus home together.$1#$b#I do. It's just.. It's not that kind of feeling for me. It can't be.$2"/pause 1000/shake Martin 500/pause 1000/speak Martin "...$2"/pause 650/speak Claire "..Martin, are you okay?$2"/pause 800/shake Martin 300/pause 700/speak Martin "..I'll be fine.$2"/pause 1000/speak Claire "I'm going to go for a little walk to give you some space. I'll be back before the bus gets here, okay?$2"/pause 1000/faceDirection Claire 2 true/pause 300/speed Claire 1/move Claire 0 2 3/speed Claire 1/move Claire -1 0 2/speed Claire 1/move Claire 0 2 2 true/pause 200/showFrame Martin 0 true/pause 500/speak Martin "Claire.. I...$2"/pause 650/faceDirection Claire 1 true/pause 300/faceDirection Claire 0 true/pause 500/speak Claire "Yes?$1"/pause 700/speak Martin "... Thank you. I do still want to be friends.$6"/pause 500/speak Claire "Good. I was hoping you would...$2#$b#I'll be back soon.$1"/pause 1000/faceDirection Claire 1 true/pause 300/faceDirection Claire 2 true/pause 300/speed Claire 1/move Claire 0 8 2 true/pause 1750/faceDirection Martin 1 true/pause 300/faceDirection Martin 0 true/pause 1500/shake Martin 500/pause 1000/addConversationTopic MartinConfession/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/end

Entries.3917586/e 3917585/O Shane/A shaneSaloon2: spring_day_ambient/45 71/farmer 47 71 1 Shane 37 72 1 Marnie 48 70 2/addWorldState shanePK/emote Shane 56 true/move Shane 8 0 0/pause 500/speak Shane "Okay... I'm ready for another round!"/pause 500/move Shane 0 -1 0/playSound doorClose/warp Shane -100 -100/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 2 true/showFrame 0/emote farmer 12 true/emote Marnie 12/speak Marnie "Alright... we've caught him in the act. Now let's confront him. Take a deep breath... $s"/move farmer 0 1 3/move farmer -2 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 0/playSound doorClose/warp farmer -100 -100/move Marnie 0 2 3/move Marnie -3 0 0/move Marnie 0 -1 0/playSound doorClose/warp Marnie -100 -100/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/changeLocation Saloon/warp Shane 33 18/warp Marnie 18 21/warp farmer 19 21/faceDirection Marnie 1 true/faceDirection farmer 1 true/positionOffset farmer 0 16/advancedMove farmer false 6 0 0 -2 8 0 4 10/advancedMove Marnie false 6 0 0 -2 8 0 4 10/specificTemporarySprite shaneSaloonCola/playMusic none/pause 3000/viewport 33 18 true/pause 800/playSound Cowboy_gunshot/pause 200/emote Shane 52 true/playSound Cowboy_gunshot/pause 200/playSound Cowboy_gunshot/pause 200/playSound Cowboy_gunshot/pause 160/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 140/playSound Cowboy_gunshot/pause 170/shake Shane 500/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 200/playSound Cowboy_monsterDie/pause 500/playSound cowboy_gunload/pause 700/playSound Cowboy_gunshot/shake Shane 500/pause 200/playSound Cowboy_gunshot/pause 160/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 140/playSound Cowboy_gunshot/pause 170/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/jump Shane/pause 200/playSound Cowboy_monsterDie/pause 500/playSound cowboy_dead/jump Shane/pause 500/textAboveHead Shane "Arrgh!"/pause 2000/playMusic distantBanjo/textAboveHead Shane "So close..."/pause 3000/faceDirection Shane 1 true/pause 100/faceDirection Shane 2/animate Shane false true 100 18/jump Shane/pause 500/stopAnimation Shane/showFrame Shane 0/emote Shane 16/speak Shane "Oh, hey! Didn't know I had an audience.$h"/faceDirection Marnie 1 true/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Marnie 0 true/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Marnie "Shaylin... this is what you've been doing in here?$s"/pause 500/speak Shane "Yeah! What did you think?$h"/faceDirection Shane 1 true/pause 100/faceDirection Shane 0/speak Shane "I'm completely addicted to this game...#$b#I can't help but play round after round..."/pause 500/faceDirection Shane 1 true/pause 100/faceDirection Shane 2/pause 500/animate Shane false true 100 34/pause 500/speak Shane "I've even reached the number three spot in the global leaderboards... you might say I'm one of the best.$h"/pause 500/stopAnimation Shane/pause 100/move Marnie 0 -1 1/speak Marnie "But... these cans...$s"/pause 500/faceDirection Shane 3/pause 200/emote Shane 8/speak Shane "Oh, that's just Joja Cola... Yeah, yeah, I know... It's bad for the teeth. But it helps me focus..."/pause 1000/faceDirection Shane 2/pause 200/faceDirection Shane 3/faceDirection Shane 2/faceDirection Shane 3/speak Shane "Wait... did you guys think I was drinking beer?$a"/faceDirection Marnie 2/emote Marnie 28/faceDirection Shane 2/speak Shane "@? I told you I hadn't been drinking...$a"/question fork0 "#We were worried...#I'm sorry, I should've believed you"/fork wewereworried/emote farmer 40/faceDirection Marnie 1/pause 1000/faceDirection Shane 2/emote Shane 40/speak Shane "...That's alright, @. You're just looking out for me. I get it.#$b#Look... I know I haven't been perfect... but, I'm trying my best... and I'm gonna keep trying. So you don't have to worry about me.#$b#My life is better now than it's ever been. I'm not in such a dark place anymore..."/pause 500/emote Marnie 20 true/emote farmer 20 true/pause 1300/faceDirection Shane 0/speak Shane "You know, when I'm playing this game, I become so focused that I can't think about anything else. It really helps when I've got 'the urge'..."/faceDirection Shane 2/speak Shane "Anyway... I'll just... eh... play ONE more round and head home. Okay?"/pause 1000/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/end dialogue Shane "You guys must have been really confused when you came in and saw me in front of the arcade machine!$h"

Entries.CommunityDay_Marnie: Shaylin's biggest enemy is himself. But underneath it all, she really does care about animals. And people, too.$0
